info.description: Squirts water to attack.
Hurts foes when they switch in.
A full-body charge attack.
An attack that may poison the foe.
Raises the user's Defense.
Sharply raises the user's evasiveness.
An attack that may lower Speed.
Attacks 5 turns with rising power.
Poisons foes when they switch in.
Adds user & foe's HPs. Shares total.
Stronger if the user's HP is low.
An attack that may confuse the foe.
Fires pins that strike 2-5 times.
A tackle that also hurts the user.
Swings tail like a wave in a storm.
An attack that may poison the foe.
The foe faints if the user does.
A powerful Watertype attack.
A tackle that also hurts the user.

tmHmMoves.name: Curse
tmHmMoves.description: Works differently for Ghost-types.

tmHmMoves.name: Toxic
tmHmMoves.description: A Poison move with increasing damage.

tmHmMoves.name: Hail
tmHmMoves.description: Inflicts damage every turn.

tmHmMoves.name: Venoshock
tmHmMoves.description: Damage doubles if foe is poisoned.

tmHmMoves.name: Hidden Power
tmHmMoves.description: The type varies with the Pokemon.

tmHmMoves.name: Ice Beam
tmHmMoves.description: An attack that may freeze the foe.

tmHmMoves.name: Blizzard
tmHmMoves.description: An attack that may freeze the foe.

tmHmMoves.name: Protect
tmHmMoves.description: Foils attack that turn. It may fail.

tmHmMoves.name: Rain Dance
tmHmMoves.description: Boosts Water-type moves for 5 turns.

tmHmMoves.name: Return
tmHmMoves.description: An attack that is based on loyalty.

tmHmMoves.name: Shadow Ball
tmHmMoves.description: An attack that may lower Sp.Def.

tmHmMoves.name: Double Team
tmHmMoves.description: Raises the user's evasiveness.

tmHmMoves.name: Sludge Bomb
tmHmMoves.description: An attack that may poison the foe.

tmHmMoves.name: Swift
tmHmMoves.description: An attack that never misses.

tmHmMoves.name: Substitute
tmHmMoves.description: Makes a decoy with 1/4 user's max HP.

tmHmMoves.name: Facade
tmHmMoves.description: Double damage with Psn, Brn, or Prz.

tmHmMoves.name: Rest
tmHmMoves.description: Sleep for 2 turns to fully recover.

tmHmMoves.name: Attract
tmHmMoves.description: Makes the opposite gender infatuated.

tmHmMoves.name: Scald
tmHmMoves.description: An attack that may inflict a burn.

tmHmMoves.name: Water Pulse
tmHmMoves.description: An attack that may confuse the foe.

tmHmMoves.name: Explosion
tmHmMoves.description: Very powerful but makes user faint.

tmHmMoves.name: Poison Jab
tmHmMoves.description: An attack that may poison the foe.

tmHmMoves.name: Thunder Wave
tmHmMoves.description: paralyzes the foe.@

tmHmMoves.name: Gyro Ball
tmHmMoves.description: Does more damage at lower speed.

tmHmMoves.name: Swords Dance
tmHmMoves.description: Sharply raises the user's Attack.

tmHmMoves.name: Surf
tmHmMoves.description: A strong Watertype attack.

tmHmMoves.name: Whirlpool
tmHmMoves.description: Traps the foe for 2-5 turns.

tmHmMoves.name: Waterfall
tmHmMoves.description: An attack that may cause flinching.

tmHmMoves.name: Agility
tmHmMoves.description: Sharply raises the user's Speed.

tmHmMoves.name: Aqua Tail
tmHmMoves.description: Swings tail like a wave in a storm.

tmHmMoves.name: Defense Curl
tmHmMoves.description: Raises the user's Defense.

tmHmMoves.name: Double Edge
tmHmMoves.description: A tackle that also hurts the user.

tmHmMoves.name: Endure
tmHmMoves.description: Endures any hit with at least 1HP.

tmHmMoves.name: Headbutt
tmHmMoves.description: An attack that may cause flinching.

tmHmMoves.name: Icy Wind
tmHmMoves.description: An icy attack that lowers Speed.

tmHmMoves.name: Rollout
tmHmMoves.description: Attacks 5 turns with rising power.

tmHmMoves.name: Sleep Talk
tmHmMoves.description: Randomly attacks while asleep.

tmHmMoves.name: Swagger
tmHmMoves.description: Causes confusion but raises Attack.

default.description: When faced with a larger opponent, it swallows as much water as it can to match the opponent's size.

Hisuian.description: Fishers detest it because it sprays poison from its spines, getting it everywhere.
